hobbies.title: Hobbies:
hobbies.desc: I like to ride the bike to work, swimming, and working out. I also like reading design magazines, go to museums, and binge watching a good tv show while it’s raining outside.
hobbies.desc1: Iron Maid, DC/AC, Megablow, The Ill, Kung Fighters, System of a Revenge.

hobbies.title: Favourite TV Shows:
hobbies.desc: Breaking Good, RedDevil, People of Interest, The Running Dead, Found, American Guy.
hobbies.desc1: The Crime of the Century, Egiptian Mythology 101, The Scarred Wizard, Lord of the Wings,  Amongst Gods, The Oracle, A Tale of Air and Water.

hobbies.title: Favourite Movies:
hobbies.desc: Idiocratic, The Scarred Wizard and the Fire Crown, Crime Squad Ferrum Man.
hobbies.desc1: Martin T. Georgeston, Jhonathan R. Token, Ivana Rowle, Alexandr Platt, Marcus Roth.

hobbies.title: Favourite Games:
hobbies.desc: The First of Us, Assassin’s Squad, Dark Assylum, NMAK16, Last Cause 4, Grand Snatch Auto.
hobbies.desc1: Swimming, Surfing, Sviho Diving, Anime, Photography, Tattoos, Street Art.
